scripts.android-full-debug-build: npm run android-debug-bundle && npm run android-debug-clean && npm run android-debug-apk && cd .\android\app\build\outputs\apk\debug && rename app-debug.apk animation.apk && npm run android-debug-apk-folder
scripts.android-debug-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
